# triggers

**Article**

A list of prims that execute a behavior’s actions.

## Overview

The runtime executes all actions in the [doc://com.apple.usd/documentation/USD/actions] array if the conditions of any trigger in [doc://com.apple.usd/documentation/USD/triggers] are satisfied. Only insert [doc://com.apple.usd/documentation/USD/preliminary-trigger] prims in this array.

### Declaration

```other
rel triggers
```

## Properties

- **actions**: A list of actions that make up the group.
- **exclusive**: A Boolean value that determines if a behavior executes exclusively.
